events.message: Customer reported a car accident that occurred at the intersection during heavy rain, resulting in visible damage to the front bumper.
Claim was categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing initial report and photos of the damaged vehicle.
An agent has been assigned to the case to coordinate further actions and assist the customer through the claims process.
Acknowledgement sent to the customer confirming receipt of the claim and outlining the next steps for assessment.
Request sent to the customer for additional documents including police report, photos of the accident scene, and repair estimates.
Customer submitted all requested documents including police report and detailed repair quotations from authorized garages.
Investigation team began reviewing submission documents and contacting involved parties to verify the claim details.
Investigation concluded confirming accidental collision fault based on witness statements and police report.
Settlement offer prepared and sent to the customer detailing coverage for vehicle repair costs and rental reimbursement.
Customer responded positively appreciating the clarity and promptness in processing the settlement offer.
Claim has been officially approved for payment following acceptance of the proposed settlement by the customer.
Payment for approved repair expenses was processed and issued to the customerâ€™s bank account successfully.
The claim case has been formally closed after successful payment and customer confirmation of repairs completed.
All records related to the auto accident claim have been securely archived for future reference as per policy.
